caption:
This photograph depicts a serene nature scene focusing on a body of water and lush greenery. In the foreground, calm waters stretch across the image, with a single white egret or heron standing elegantly in the shallow water near the center-left of the frame. The bird is poised, possibly looking for fish or resting.

The background is dominated by a dense line of mangrove trees lining the water's edge. These mangroves are thick and lush, with deep green leaves, and they appear to be thriving, indicating a healthy wetland ecosystem. The mangroves are reflected subtly in the water, creating a mirroring effect that enhances the tranquility of the scene.

The horizon is barely visible, but it suggests an expansive body of water beyond the mangroves. The sky is clear with a hint of light, possibly indicating early morning or late afternoon. The overall lighting in the photograph is soft, adding to the peacefulness and natural beauty of the setting.
title: White heron at Spanish Harbor Key
